attributes.action: Make 21st June a National Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details: The Government should do this to help celebrate the hard work and sacrifices of key workers and all those that followed the lockdown restrictions.
attributes.background: The Government should make 21st June 2021 a national bank holiday. This is to celebrate the end of COVID restrictions but also will help boost the economy as many people will often spend money on bank Holiday activities.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
